item.title: Cracking series #3: Steam multiplayer
item.description: Welcome to the new episode of my cracking series, today we will see how i cracked 50% (approximately) of the steam library with a simple thing. A lot of games are vulnerable to this. Let’s get started Well, i downloaded Sonic Generations from our seven seas website, and i see the crack is a .DLL file (steam_api.dll) which 1337 people archieve the way of emulate it (and get online functions)…
